12.heading: Uncertainty.
12.title: "I Was No Angel" 6 p. in Today's Romance, no. 7
12.author: [No author]
notes: "'We're together,' I told myself, when after months of separation, I tumbled into my husband's arms, 'and that's enough.' But was it? Was our love strong enough to endure a life of squalor, loneliness, and nerve-wracking uncertainty?"
Story about being an army wife.
